BATTLE CREEK, MICHIGAN
DIVISION OF EDUCATION
MAURICE F. SEAY
October 27, 1959

Dr. Harry J. Skornia, Executive Director
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
lk Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
In reviewing your financial report for 1958-59* our account¬
ing department has requested an explanation of the amount charged
for administrative expense.. As we have totaled your expenditures
for 1958-59, we get a figure of $50,950.93. Five per cent of this
amount would be $2,547.55* The amount on your report for this
administrative expense is $2,646.37* Perhaps we have not used the
right items in making our calculations.
Sincerely and with best wishes
Maurice F. Seay
MFSijf
